sentences.sContent: They are the hieroglyphics of feudalism succeeding those of theocracy .
sentences.sContent_eng: They are the hieroglyphics of feudalism succeeding those of theocracy .
sentences.sCn: 这是继神权政治象形文字之后的封建制度象形文字。

sentences.sContent: The short-lived alliance served only to put a secular face on the theocracy in the making.
sentences.sContent_eng: The short-lived alliance served only to put a secular face on the theocracy in the making.
sentences.sCn: 而此短命的联盟只是为给神权政治在缔造时带上世俗面具服务的。

sentences.sContent: Of or relating to or being a theocracy .
sentences.sContent_eng: Of or relating to or being a theocracy .
sentences.sCn: 属于、关于或是神权政治的。

synos.tran: 神政；神权政体；神治国（复数theocracies）

remMethod.val: theo(神) + cracy(统治) → 神权政治

trans.tranCn: 神权政治； 僧侣政治
trans.tranOther: a social system or state controlled by religious leaders
